Guardian of Faith

Level 4 Conjuration Spell

Call forth a divine guardian that attacks nearby enemies. Every time it deals damage, the guardian loses an equal amount of hit points.

Guardian of Faith is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Guardian of Faith is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Guardian of Faith Information

Description: Call forth a divine guardian that attacks nearby enemies. Every time it deals damage, the guardian loses an equal amount of hit points. The guardian is stationary. When an enemy is in range, it uses an attack called "Strike of the Guardian". It has a range of 3m and deals 20 Radiant damage. On a DEX save, enemies still take half damage. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Duration: 10 Turns

How to Acquire Guardian of Faith

Guardian of Faith can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Life Domain, Light Domain Guardian of Faith can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Cleric, Life Domain, Light Domain

Guardian of Faith Tips & Notes

You can encounter a hostile version of this summon above Rosymorn Monastery. It's guarding the Ceremonial Battleaxe, which can be used as part of the Blood of Lathander questline. The Guardian synergises well with other summons; which can be ordered to walk in and out of an enemy's melee range to provoke an Attack of Opportunity (from the enemy). The Guardian will then attempt to counter the AoO if it is within range.
